thread.title: TV | Hunted

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Hunted
text: This unusual Channel 4 show comes to an end tonight, which challenged a group of ordinary British people to a social experiment which sees them going on the run and taking extreme measures to avoid being found. This final episode sees them at just seven days to go, where the remaining fugitives must reach a pre-arranged extraction point to evade capture once and for all. However, clocks are ticking and the hunters are ramping up their efforts to find them. Who, if any of our fugitives, will emerge as victor?
